description: Validator for the resources callflow's data object

bypass_e164.description: Use the original requested number instead of normalizing to E164

caller_id_type.description: Which configured caller-id to use (key in the 'caller_id' object)

custom_sip_headers.description: Custom SIP Headers to include on the outgoing INVITE

do_not_normalize.description: Use the original requested number instead of normalizing; otherwise try to apply the endpoint's dialplan to the requested number

dynamic_flags.description: List of function names (or 'zone') that are called on the Call record to populate the 'flags' array sent to the resource(s) for matching
